name: Euclidean.ball_eq_preimage
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : AddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalAddGroup E
inst✝³ : T2Space E
inst✝² : Module Real E
inst✝¹ : ContinuousSMul Real E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real E
x : E
r : Real
⊢ Eq (Euclidean.ball x r) (Set.preimage (⇑toEuclidean) (Metric.ball (toEuclidean x) r))
decl:
theorem ball_eq_preimage (x : E) (r : ℝ) :
    ball x r = toEuclidean ⁻¹' Metric.ball (toEuclidean x) r :=
  rfl

name: Euclidean.closedBall_eq_preimage
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : AddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalAddGroup E
inst✝³ : T2Space E
inst✝² : Module Real E
inst✝¹ : ContinuousSMul Real E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real E
x : E
r : Real
⊢ Eq (Euclidean.closedBall x r) (Set.preimage (⇑toEuclidean) (Metric.closedBall (toEuclidean x) r))
decl:
theorem closedBall_eq_preimage (x : E) (r : ℝ) :
    closedBall x r = toEuclidean ⁻¹' Metric.closedBall (toEuclidean x) r :=
  rfl

name: Euclidean.ball_subset_closedBall
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : AddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalAddGroup E
inst✝³ : T2Space E
inst✝² : Module Real E
inst✝¹ : ContinuousSMul Real E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real E
x : E
r : Real
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (Euclidean.ball x r) (Euclidean.closedBall x r)
decl:
theorem ball_subset_closedBall {x : E} {r : ℝ} : ball x r ⊆ closedBall x r := fun _ (hy : _ < r) =>
  le_of_lt hy

name: Euclidean.isOpen_ball
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : AddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalAddGroup E
inst✝³ : T2Space E
inst✝² : Module Real E
inst✝¹ : ContinuousSMul Real E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real E
x : E
r : Real
⊢ IsOpen (Euclidean.ball x r)
decl:
theorem isOpen_ball {x : E} {r : ℝ} : IsOpen (ball x r) :=
  Metric.isOpen_ball.preimage toEuclidean.continuous

name: Euclidean.mem_ball_self
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : AddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalAddGroup E
inst✝³ : T2Space E
inst✝² : Module Real E
inst✝¹ : ContinuousSMul Real E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real E
x : E
r : Real
hr : LT.lt 0 r
⊢ Membership.mem (Euclidean.ball x r) x
decl:
theorem mem_ball_self {x : E} {r : ℝ} (hr : 0 < r) : x ∈ ball x r :=
  Metric.mem_ball_self hr

name: Euclidean.closedBall_eq_image
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : AddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalAddGroup E
inst✝³ : T2Space E
inst✝² : Module Real E
inst✝¹ : ContinuousSMul Real E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real E
x : E
r : Real
⊢ Eq (Euclidean.closedBall x r) (Set.image (⇑toEuclidean.symm) (Metric.closedBall (toEuclidean x) r))
decl:
theorem closedBall_eq_image (x : E) (r : ℝ) :
    closedBall x r = toEuclidean.symm '' Metric.closedBall (toEuclidean x) r := by
  rw [toEuclidean.image_symm_eq_preimage, closedBall_eq_preimage]

name: Euclidean.isCompact_closedBall
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : AddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalAddGroup E
inst✝³ : T2Space E
inst✝² : Module Real E
inst✝¹ : ContinuousSMul Real E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real E
x : E
r : Real
⊢ IsCompact (Euclidean.closedBall x r)
decl:
nonrec theorem isCompact_closedBall {x : E} {r : ℝ} : IsCompact (closedBall x r) := by
  rw [closedBall_eq_image]
  exact (isCompact_closedBall _ _).image toEuclidean.symm.continuous

name: Euclidean.isClosed_closedBall
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : AddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalAddGroup E
inst✝³ : T2Space E
inst✝² : Module Real E
inst✝¹ : ContinuousSMul Real E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real E
x : E
r : Real
⊢ IsClosed (Euclidean.closedBall x r)
decl:
theorem isClosed_closedBall {x : E} {r : ℝ} : IsClosed (closedBall x r) :=
  isCompact_closedBall.isClosed

name: Euclidean.closure_ball
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : AddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalAddGroup E
inst✝³ : T2Space E
inst✝² : Module Real E
inst✝¹ : ContinuousSMul Real E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real E
x : E
r : Real
h : Ne r 0
⊢ Eq (closure (Euclidean.ball x r)) (Euclidean.closedBall x r)
decl:
nonrec theorem closure_ball (x : E) {r : ℝ} (h : r ≠ 0) : closure (ball x r) = closedBall x r := by
  rw [ball_eq_preimage, ← toEuclidean.preimage_closure, closure_ball (toEuclidean x) h,
    closedBall_eq_preimage]

name: Euclidean.exists_pos_lt_subset_ball
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : AddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalAddGroup E
inst✝³ : T2Space E
inst✝² : Module Real E
inst✝¹ : ContinuousSMul Real E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real E
R : Real
s : Set E
x : E
hR : LT.lt 0 R
hs : IsClosed s
h : HasSubset.Subset s (Euclidean.ball x R)
⊢ Exists fun r => And (Membership.mem (Set.Ioo 0 R) r) (HasSubset.Subset s (Euclidean.ball x r))
decl:
nonrec theorem exists_pos_lt_subset_ball {R : ℝ} {s : Set E} {x : E} (hR : 0 < R) (hs : IsClosed s)
    (h : s ⊆ ball x R) : ∃ r ∈ Ioo 0 R, s ⊆ ball x r := by
  rw [ball_eq_preimage, ← image_subset_iff] at h
  rcases exists_pos_lt_subset_ball hR (toEuclidean.isClosed_image.2 hs) h with ⟨r, hr, hsr⟩
  exact ⟨r, hr, image_subset_iff.1 hsr⟩

name: Euclidean.nhds_basis_closedBall
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : AddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalAddGroup E
inst✝³ : T2Space E
inst✝² : Module Real E
inst✝¹ : ContinuousSMul Real E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real E
x : E
⊢ (nhds x).HasBasis (fun r => LT.lt 0 r) (Euclidean.closedBall x)
decl:
theorem nhds_basis_closedBall {x : E} : (𝓝 x).HasBasis (fun r : ℝ => 0 < r) (closedBall x) := by
  rw [toEuclidean.toHomeomorph.nhds_eq_comap x]
  exact Metric.nhds_basis_closedBall.comap _

name: Euclidean.closedBall_mem_nhds
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : AddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalAddGroup E
inst✝³ : T2Space E
inst✝² : Module Real E
inst✝¹ : ContinuousSMul Real E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real E
x : E
r : Real
hr : LT.lt 0 r
⊢ Membership.mem (nhds x) (Euclidean.closedBall x r)
decl:
theorem closedBall_mem_nhds {x : E} {r : ℝ} (hr : 0 < r) : closedBall x r ∈ 𝓝 x :=
  nhds_basis_closedBall.mem_of_mem hr

name: Euclidean.nhds_basis_ball
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : AddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalAddGroup E
inst✝³ : T2Space E
inst✝² : Module Real E
inst✝¹ : ContinuousSMul Real E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real E
x : E
⊢ (nhds x).HasBasis (fun r => LT.lt 0 r) (Euclidean.ball x)
decl:
theorem nhds_basis_ball {x : E} : (𝓝 x).HasBasis (fun r : ℝ => 0 < r) (ball x) := by
  rw [toEuclidean.toHomeomorph.nhds_eq_comap x]
  exact Metric.nhds_basis_ball.comap _

name: Euclidean.ball_mem_nhds
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : AddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalAddGroup E
inst✝³ : T2Space E
inst✝² : Module Real E
inst✝¹ : ContinuousSMul Real E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real E
x : E
r : Real
hr : LT.lt 0 r
⊢ Membership.mem (nhds x) (Euclidean.ball x r)
decl:
theorem ball_mem_nhds {x : E} {r : ℝ} (hr : 0 < r) : ball x r ∈ 𝓝 x :=
  nhds_basis_ball.mem_of_mem hr

name: ContDiff.euclidean_dist
initialProofState:
F : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup F
inst✝³ : NormedSpace Real F
G : Type u_3
inst✝² : NormedAddCommGroup G
inst✝¹ : NormedSpace Real G
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional Real G
f g : F → G
n : ENat
hf : ContDiff Real (↑n) f
hg : ContDiff Real (↑n) g
h : ∀ (x : F), Ne (f x) (g x)
⊢ ContDiff Real ↑n fun x => Euclidean.dist (f x) (g x)
decl:
theorem ContDiff.euclidean_dist (hf : ContDiff ℝ n f) (hg : ContDiff ℝ n g) (h : ∀ x, f x ≠ g x) :
    ContDiff ℝ n fun x => Euclidean.dist (f x) (g x) := by
  simp only [Euclidean.dist]
  apply ContDiff.dist ℝ
  exacts [(toEuclidean (E := G)).contDiff.comp hf,
    (toEuclidean (E := G)).contDiff.comp hg, fun x => toEuclidean.injective.ne (h x)]
